text: Association Sportive Nyuki is a Congolese football club based in Butembo, North Kivu province. The club was founded in 1977 and currently playing in the Linafoot, the top level of professional football in DR Congo. In 2018, AS Nyuki, has managed to win the Coupe du Congo (DR Congo) for the first time in the club's history. ==Honours== Coupe du Congo * Winners (1): 2018 ==Performance in CAF competitions== *CAF Confederation Cup: 1 appearances ::2018–19 – First Round ==References== ==External links== * Category:Football clubs in the Democratic Republic of the Congo
title: AS Nyuki
